title: #263 - Emil Cioran
itunes:title: #263 - Emil Cioran
description: In the mid-20th century, the European philosophy scene became enamored with a little Romanian depressed guy by the name of Emil Cioran. This week, Dan tries his best to get Connor to feel the love for this sad weirdo. Their discussion drifts from Catcher In The Rye to continental philosophy to Cioran's unfortunate history with fascism. TW: There are a lot of jokes about suicide in this ep, but if you feel like you need help please seek it out! Also, Patreon.com/Drunkenphilosophy!
